Translations.Text: Iya, anata gata wa (hate nai) ukiyo o aishite
raise o tōkan ni suru
Sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kagayaki
kare-ra no omo o, aogi miru
Mata sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kuraku
sebone o kudaku hodo no dai sainan ga, kare-ra ni furikakaru koto o shirudearou
Iya,(tamashī ga) nodomoto ni todoku toki
iwa reyou. `Dareka, noroi ga dekiru ka
Kare wa ribetsu (no toki)dearu koto o satorudearou
Hitotsu no ashi wa tahō no ashi ni karamari
sonohi kare wa, omo ni karitate rareru
Kare wa shinri o ukeirezu, mata reihai mo bō-ge nakatta
kaette (Mari) o kyogi to shi, somuki sari
omoi agatte kazoku no moto ni omomuita
Anata (tashinkyō to) ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na
Kasanete iu. Anata ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na
Ningen wa,(mokuteki mo naku) sono mama de hōnin sa reru to omou no ka
Motomoto kare wa shashutsu sa reta, itteki no seiekide wa nakatta ka
Sore kara hitokatamari no chi to nari, sarani arrā ga,(kinsei ni) katachidzukuri
kare wa, ningen o otome no ryōsei ni nasa reta node wa nakatta ka
Sore demo kare ni wa, shisha o yomigaera seru o-ryoku ga nai to suru no ka
Ningen ni wa, nani mo no tomo yobenai, nagai jiki ga attade wanai ka
Hontōni ware wa kare o kokoromiru tame kongō shita itteki no seieki kara ningen o tsukutta. Sorede ware wa chōkaku to shikaku o kare ni sazuketa
Ware wa, ningen ni (tadashī) michi o shimeshita. Kansha suru mono (shinjiru mono) ni naru ka, shinjinai mono ni naru ka, to
Fushinjin-sha ni wa, ware wa kusari to kubikase to rekka o junbi shite oita
(Shinja no) zenkōsha wa, kāfūru o mazeta hai (no nomimono) o nomudearou
